November 26, 2024 - The private label Mama Bear sells baby wipes, baby food, diaper pail refills and baby laundry detergent. In 2018, the brand began selling newborn through size six diapers, which were previously offered by the Amazon Elements private brand before their removal from the site in 2014.

t: Amazon is dropping dozens of in-house brands you didn’t even know it owned | The Verge

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund.
